abstract: Walter Alejandro Gargano Guevara (born 23 July 1984) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Serie A club Parma on loan from Napoli and the Uruguayan national team.
comment: Walter Alejandro Gargano Guevara (born 23 July 1984) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Serie A club Parma on loan from Napoli and the Uruguayan national team.
